name: Stratosphere Networks
description:
We offer business to business (B2B) IT solutions encompassing both on-premise and hosted solutions.
We partner with best-in-class solution providers including Microsoft, VMWare, Citrix, Sonicwall, Cisco, Juniper, Aruba, Meru, Extreme, and more.
Our professional services group designs, implements and maintains your IT infrastructure at all levels. Businesses that lack IT staff turn to us for full helpdesk, server, and infrastructure support. Businesses that do have IT personnel on staff can utilize our IT overlay services to support their groups.
